attributes.action: the cost of bus fees for children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i do not understand why children and young people below the age of 18 who are not classed as adults and do not have the rite to vote, drink,have to pay adult fairs on buses once they reach an certin age, and now buses are not even letting children have half fairs unless they have a young persons travel card, arguing with parents over there childs age. people under 18 should pay child fairs as that is what they are, children. this should be on buses & trains also they should not have to get a young persons card what they have to pay for to get this discount if they are young ok if they start looking older but they should not have to pay for the id..
